name: Devil's Cove Adventure Game
blurb: A classic Point-&-Click adventure game by indie game developer Anarchy Enterprises (for PC, Mac, iPhone/iPad & Android Phones/Tablets)

rewards.reward: DEVIL'S ADVOCATE --- You will have our eternal gratitude! \u2022 An email thank you note from Anarchy Enterprises \u2022 Exclusive digital wallpaper that we will only give to Kickstarter backers
DEVIL'S APPRENTICE --- All above rewards plus:\r\n\u2022 Ongoing Developer Diaries so you can follow the development process \u2022 Devil's Cove "Special Thanks" credit in the game!

DEVIL'S SUPPORTER --- All above rewards plus:
• Download of the Standard Edition of Devil's Cove for the PC, Mac, iOS devices (iPhone & iPad), and Android devices (phones and tablets) • You will get to play the Beta Version of Devil's Cove • 
You will get to give feedback on the Beta Version of Devil's Cove that will help us shape the final game • Devil's Cove Strategy Guide eBook (PDF)
• Exclusive digital poster that we will only give to Kickstarter backers • Devil's Cove "Beta Tester" credit in the game!

DEVIL'S FRIEND --- All above rewards plus:\r\n\u2022 Download of the Collector's Edition of Devil's Cove for PC, Mac, iOS devices (iPhone & iPad), and Android devices (phones and tablets) \u2022 The Collector's Edition includes: \u2022 An in-game Strategy Guide \u2022 Bonus gameplay \u2022 Additional game locations \u2022 Alternate endings depending on decisions you make during the game \u2022 (not available in the Standard Edition)

ANGEL'S FRIEND (an alternate name for those of you who didn't like the Devil titles) --- All above rewards plus: \u2022 Download of the Collector's Edition of Devil's Cove for PC, Mac, iOS devices (iPhone & iPad), and Android devices (phones and tablets) \u2022 The Collector's Edition includes: \u2022 An in-game Strategy Guide \u2022 Bonus gameplay \u2022 Additional game locations \u2022 Alternate endings depending on decisions you make during the game \u2022 (not available in the Standard Edition)

DEVIL'S BENEFACTOR --- All above rewards plus: \u2022 The Making of Devil's Cove eBook (PDF) \u2022 Devil's Cove Digital Soundtrack \u2022 Digital copy of the Anarchy Enterprises game "Ghost Encounters: Deadwood" (PC only)

DEVIL'S WARRIOR --- All above rewards plus: \u2022 CD version of the Devil's Cove soundtrack \u2022 Devil's Cove game Poster \u2022 Anarchy Enterprises T-Shirt \u2022 Devil's Cove "Lead Beta Tester" credit in the game! \u2022 (Please add $15 for shipping outside the US)

DEVIL'S GLADIATOR --- All above rewards plus: \u2022 Boxed Kickstarter Special Edition version of the Collector's Edition of Devil's Cove on CD/DVD. Please note: This Special Edition box art is unique to Kickstarter and will not be available again \u2022 Anarchy Enterprises game Poster \u2022  (Please add $15 for shipping outside the US)

DEVIL'S CRUSADER --- All above rewards plus:\r\n\u2022 Printed color HARDCOVER copy of the Making of Devil's Cove signed by key members of the development team \u2022 Devil's Cove "Associate Producer" credit in the game! \u2022 (Please add $15 for shipping outside the US)

DEVIL'S CHAMPION --- All above rewards plus: \u2022 Limited edition METAL medallion as seen in the game. This is made of REAL METAL and is a very cool "prop" from the game \u2022 Signed limited edition print of a dramatic moment from the game and signed by key members of the development team \u2022 Devil's Cove T-Shirt

DEVIL'S HERO --- All above rewards plus: \u2022 Original layout drawing from the game signed by the artist who created it. This is an amazing, one-of-a-kind item that only you will have! \u2022 Limited edition "Key to the City" of Devil's Cove. This METAL key is a rare collector's item you will be proud to display in your trophy case. \u2022 Your name will appear on something within the game. It could be a store sign, an item in the game, or maybe even in part of the storyline! \u2022 Original 2001 box of Anarchy Enterprises first retail game "Moon Tycoon"  which will be signed by some of the key members of the development team \u2022 Devil's Cove "Producer" credit in the game!

DEVIL'S RIVAL -- All above rewards plus: \u2022 A 2nd original drawing from the game signed by the artist who created it. Now you will have 2 unique drawings that no one else will have! \u2022 Your face will appear on something within the game. It could be a painting, a newspaper, or even on a gameplay item - you'll have to wait and see where your face will show-up! \u2022 A 2nd Limited Edition Devil's Cove game Poster signed by key members of the development team

DEVIL'S MASTER --- All above rewards plus: \u2022 A real, handmade LEATHER Plague Doctor Mask! This is an amazing, full-size game "prop" that you will cherish as a true work of art. \u2022 A 3rd original drawing from the game signed by the artist who created it. Each of the 3 original drawings will have been drawn by a different game artist, making this a truly unique set of original game artwork! \u2022 Devil's Cove "Executive Producer" credit in the game!

DEVIL'S GRAND MASTER --- All above rewards plus: \u2022 A full-size Plague Doctor Costume that will allow you to become the most sinister villain in Devil's Cove, or simply cherish it as an amazing collectible from the game! \u2022 Become one of the characters in Devil's Cove. We will replicate your likeness and bring you to life within the game world. An amazing reward that will make YOU a part of the game! \u2022 A dozen prints of your character inside the game world, each signed by key members of the development team. You will forever be immortalized as a game character with plenty of prints to horde for yourself or to give as gifts to family and friends
